content.text:
# King's Play Hill

'''King's Play Hill''' () is a 29.5 hectare biological Site of Special Scientific Interest near Heddington, Wiltshire, notified in 1971.
Sources
* [https://designatedsites.naturalengland.org.uk/PDFsForWeb/Citation/1004413.pdf Natural England citation sheet for the site] (accessed 7 April 2022)
External links
* [https://designatedsites.naturalengland.org.uk/ Natural England website] (SSSI information)
